website_summaries.verdict: Generally, the Ultraboost City is well-received by a lot of runners. One of the most commended features of the shoe is the comfort that it provides. A lot of the users also lauded the fashionable exterior of the shoe. The shoe was also very versatile as it can be used for both casual and long-distance running. However, one of the identified downsides of the shoe is its tightness and that it caused pain when running.
pros: The Adidas Ultraboost City offers a snug fit and security to the foot while running, several runners mention
The shoe is very comfortable to wear, a lot of the users say
A lot of the wearers commend the colorway of the shoe
The shoe is very fashionable and versatile, as noted by some of the users
Some runners commend the lightweight feel the shoe gives
cons: One of the runners claims that the shoe’s toe box is too narrow
The top part of the upper was too tight
it causes pain when running, some of the runners claim

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy but sole durability lets it down
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and suits my running style. The upper sole seems quite robust but the big downside of these is the durability of the sole. I have covered 220 miles in the last 4 weeks and the black bit of the sole is nearly down to the white foam layer already! I just wish adidas would make there soles more durable, but somehow retain the light-weight nature of these shoes. Despite this, the shoes and I do get on so I just have to take the durabilityissue and high cost on the chin!
customer_reviews.author: glossopwhite

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, feel slightly different to run in. But found it comfortable. I would recommend try a pair on first. I went up 1/2 a size
customer_reviews.author: Mr P J Bland

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stylish, however I prefer the previous boost ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and stylish,however I prefer the previous boost,my times have not benefited from the latest shoes as they did from the previous version
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Top Product.. Just ordered wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product.. I just ordered the wrong size. If you are a size 9 in adidas originals then make sure you order a size 10 in anything adidas performance. All my originals are 9s and footy boots etc are 10s. Shame I had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for long distance road running. And Becks wears them too.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Mark B Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best running shoe on the market for a neutral runner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant daps wish I could afford more pairs !!! Endless energy 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Possibly the best trainers i have ever ran in
customer_reviews.text: Possibly the best trainers i have ever ran in!!!!! so comfortable and endless energy as it says in there slogan
customer_reviews.author: David Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Con man
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't bother to post items. Stay well away unless you like to waste your time chasing for a refund. Con man 1 star as it wouldn't allow me to give him less
customer_reviews.author: grahamb290

customer_reviews.title: These ARE NOT SS16, they are SS15
customer_reviews.text: OK these shoes are great. Revelation to me how well cushioned they are, and how comfortable. Went 20 miles in them on Sunday and can still feel the 'boost' effect. However, I bought these on the basis that they are the latest adidas Ultra Boost and THEY ARE NOT. If you look on other sites the SS16 versions don't come in this colour, and the box I got these in specifically says SS15. They're last year's version, so fine if you want to buy them on that basis, there isn't THAT much of a difference I don't think. But don't buy them thinking you've found a good deal for the latest version of the shoes as I did.
customer_reviews.author: Ian McKee

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoes i have worn
customer_reviews.text: This is the best running shoe I have used in years. Comfortable and durable. The boost sole just keeps on giving back. The shoes are not the lightest around but superior comfort more than makes up for that. I have had 3 pairs of these and will just keep on wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: JustMMB

product_meta.title: adidas Ultraboost City Shoes Men's
product_meta.description: All hail the stars and stripes. The design of these running shoes pays homage to the star-spangled banner. They have a knit upper with a second-skin fit. Responsive cushioning returns energy to your stride.
feature_bullets: Stretch heel design with external molded counter protect Achilles while promoting natural movement.
Full-length Boost midsole cushioning absorbs impacts.
Midfoot Torsion System adds stability and control for an efficient gait.
